resources.string: \t I\'m originally from the central valley of California. I moved to South Lake Tahoe after high school where I fell in love with the outdoors. Some of my favorite hobbies I found while I was living there included skiing, rock climbing, and backpacking.
Here is a picture of me skiing off a cliff!
This is me \"walking\" down a beginner trail.
This is me climbing at Mayhem in South Lake Tahoe.
